Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at London City Suites by Montcalm, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from Barbican Arts Centre and minutes from St. Giles Cripplegate. This 5-star apartment is close to St. Paul's Cathedral and London Bridge.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 235 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms feature rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, and rollaway/extra beds can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a sauna, a steam room, and a fitness center. This apartment also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the apartment's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the apartment's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at London City Suites by Montcalm, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from Barbican Arts Centre and minutes from St. Giles Cripplegate. This 5-star apartment is close to St. Paul's Cathedral and London Bridge.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Barbican Arts Centre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
St. Giles Cripplegate - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Museum of London - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
London Guildhall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Smithfield Market - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Bank of England Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
London Mansion House - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Exchange - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
St. Stephen Walbrook - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
London Stock Exchange - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
St. Paul's Cathedral - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Hoxton Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi
The Gherkin - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Old Bailey - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Leadenhall Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 9.9 km / 6.2 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 25.5 km / 15.8 mi

The preferred airport for London City Suites by Montcalm is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
